posts.title: 你好，世界
posts.text: Natural Language 汉语[Chinese]你好 世界 EnglishHello World 日本語[Japanese]こんにちは世界 한국어[Korean]안녕하세요 월드 Français[French]Bonjour le monde Русский[Russian]Привет мир Español[Spanish]Hola Mundo Deutsche[German]Hallo Welt Português[Portuguese]Olá Mundo العربية[Arabic]مرحبا بالعالم Programming Language C 12345#include <stdio.h>int main(){ printf("Hello World!\n"); return 0;} C++ 123456#include <iostream>using namespace std;int main(){ cout << "Hello World!" << endl; return 0;} Java 1234567public class HelloWorld{ public static void main(String[] args) { System.out.println( "Hello World!" ); }} Python 1print("Hello World!") JavaScript 1console.log("Hello World!") PHP 1echo "Hello World!"; Go 12345package mainimport "fmt"func main(){ fmt.println("Hello World!")} Wenyan-lang 1吾有一言。曰「「問天地好在。」」。書之。 Chef 1Put cinnamon into 2nd mixing bowl BrainFuck 12++++++++++[>+++++++>++++++++++>+++>+<<<<-]>++.>+.+++++++..+++.>++.<<+++++++++++++++.>.+++.------.--------.>+.>.
